overview: Tracklist: 1. Intro  2. The Half Light  3. My Tears Are Still Falling  4. Illusions of Perfection  5. The Wine's Dance  6. Eclipse  7. Last Visions  8. My Last Pain  9. title: Silent Cry: Dark 'n' Live
